information_for_contributors: This file has been converted from https://github.com/worlpaker/go-syntax/blob/master/syntaxes/go.tmLanguage.json
If you want to provide a fix or improvement, please create a pull request against the original repository.
Once accepted there, we are happy to receive an update request.
name: Go

type-declarations-without-brackets.comment: includes all type declarations without brackets (in some cases, brackets need to be captured manually)

operators.comment: Note that the order here is very important!

patterns.comment: single function as a type returned type(s) declaration
multiple params and types | multiple params one type | one param one type
multiple params and types | multiple types one param

functions_inline.comment: functions in-line with multi return types

patterns.comment: struct/interface types in-line (type assertion) | switch type keyword
one line - property variables and types
one line with semicolon(;) without formatting gofmt - single type | property variables and types
Struct variable for struct in struct types
single type declaration with multi-lines generics
After control variables, to not highlight as a struct/interface

var_const_single_assignment.comment: var and const with single type assignment

patterns.comment: var and const with multi type assignment

switch_select_case_variables.comment: variables after case control keyword in switch/select expression

patterns.comment: property variables as parameter field in struct initialization
